channel.title: DevSecOps cells Lab
channel.description: Recent content on DevSecOps cells Lab

item.title: Cells: Tenzir
item.description: Generator Vast.yaml namespace: vast-config-<state> prod -> production std run //tenzir//generator:config-vast-prod generating config to nixosModule of the vast services.vast.settings = inputs.data-merge.merge inputs.cells-lab.tenzir.generator.prod { vast.endpoint = "192.168.1.1:4000"; }; generating config to NomadJobs of the vast deployNomadJobs.vast.prod = inputs.data-merge.merge inputs.cells.tenzir.generator.prod { vast.endpoint = "192.168.1.1:4000"; # <custom settings> }; deploy std //tenzir//deploy:vast-prod NomadJobs Vast
